name: Heli Gunship Air Battle
description:
Welcome to the most intense action and real 3d apache battle. Some terrorists groups have captured the several areas. A killer operation is launched against the terrorist to get back control of the military base and army camps. In this helicopter strike operation shoot the enemies from the gunship Heli by machine guns and missile fires.

Unleash the wrath by launching multiple attacks at the enemy base. Take the accurate aim and kill your dangerous enemy in this latest and new action air combat game. In helicopter air fight gunship strike you will fire the most powerful guns from the deadliest army gunner Heli.

Features:
• Realistic flight physics
• High quality chopper
• Dynamic camera angles
• Amazing 3d environment.
• Stunning graphics.
• Multiple fighter helicopters.
